inclusion.criterion: Oncologic patients submitted to elective videolaparoscopic surgery in Trendelenburg position
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: period of at least 2 hours in Trendelenburg position
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: With absolute contraindication and related to spinal anesthesia
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: With difficult airway prediction with possibility of awake intubation.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: With previous diagnosis of: cognitive disorder and / or depression.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic use of benzodiazepines (use during the last 12 weeks).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Referred to perform the postoperative ICU.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in right lower quadrant of abdomen, nausea and vomiting. Elevated WBC with dominant neutrophils. CT scan shows acute perforated appendicitis.
